<h1 align="center">
  Srib's blogger

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Clone the probject.**

    ```sh
    git clone https://github.com/srib1997/srib-s-blogger.git
    ```

1.  **Start developing.**

    ```sh
    cd srib-s-blogger/
    npm install
    npm develop
    ```

1.  **Open the source code and start editing!**

    Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!

    _Note: You'll also see a second link: _`http://localhost:8000/___graphql`_.
